imgDesc.text:
A movable column that can be <color=#ffe14b>raised and lowered</color> through the crystal <color=#ffe14b>receiver node</color> on the base. Though it is not the original design or intended use, the energy of the Xenochromatic Ball Octopus can control the receiver nodes, allowing it to be raised and lowered depending on its base.
Normally, when the base has <color=#ffe14b>one</color> receiver node, after the column is raised it will <color=#ffe14b>slowly fall again over time</color> , but with <color=#ffe14b>two</color> receiver nodes, <color=#ffe14b>raising</color> and <color=#ffe14b>lowering</color> the column can be controlled separately.
Sometimes, the lifting column can extend to the other side of the ground or the wall.
